*Describe the bug*  
The `Resource Approving Facility` and `Resource Requesting Facility` Card Headings are overlapping in mobile view

*To Reproduce*  
Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to <https://care.coronasafe.in/resource/ce53ee56-52b1-4211-b037-bceb3138c633|https://care.coronasafe.in/resource/ce53ee56-52b1-4211-b037-bceb3138c633>
2. Open in mobile view

*Screenshots*

<https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/57593654/171525955-19bcce3e-ace3-46ab-b13f-9b8bc635bb00.png|image>
attachments.title: <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/issues/2626|#2626 Overlapping card headings in Resource Details page>

attachments.fallback: 467x828px image
attachments.text:

Fixed the overlapping card headings issue in mobile view and made the Resource Details page more responsive

attachments.fallback: #4227 Fix (HospitalList): textarea of notify facility modal
attachments.text:
*Proposed Changes*

• Fixes <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/issues/4190|#4190>
• The issue was caused because a child component (`FacilityCard`) was defined _inside_ its parent (`HospitalList`) <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22573494/react-js-input-losing-focus-when-rerendering|Ref>
• Refactored `HospitalList` by creating a separate component for `FacilityCard`

attachments.fallback: #4337 Fix (FacilityFilter): sidebar collapses on clearing facility advanced filters
attachments.text:
*Proposed Changes*

• Fixes <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/issues/4191|#4191>
• Currently, the `Clear Filter` button closes the advanced filters. Now, it removes the filters and the sidebar stays visible as well
• The `Local Body` form field is handled separately in `LocalBodySelect.tsx`. I moved the `selectedLocalBodyObject` state into the parent component i.e. `FacilityFilter/index.tsx` to manage state (reset the form) in the parent itself

<https://www.loom.com/share/226d2c19c6d94cc584ca23cf9ddc834a|Facilities | CARE - 17 December 2022 - Watch Video>

attachments.fallback: #4441 Fix (NotificationsList): made the Notifications sidebar responsive
attachments.text:
*Proposed Changes*

• Fixes <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/issues/4387|#4387>
• Made the notification bar open from the right edge of the screen
• Earlier, the `NotificationsList` component was part of the `Sidebar` component. This caused the notification bar to open as part of the Sidebar (smaller width) in mobile view. In this PR, the `NotificationsList` component is moved higher up to the `AppRouter` component along with its state (handling its opening/closing). The state and setState for the the same have been passed down to the `Sidebar` and `NotificationsList` components

AwesomeScreenshot-1_3_2023.3.02.38AM.mp4

@ohcnetwork/care-fe-code-reviewers @ohcnetwork/code-reviewers
attachments.title: #4441 Fix (NotificationsList): made the Notifications sidebar responsive
